personal_traits: I'm a detail-oriented professional who thrives on turning complex data into actionable insights. I enjoy collaborating with cross-functional teams and have a passion for continuous learning in the data science space.
summary: Results-driven Data Analyst with 6+ years of experience transforming raw data into strategic business insights. Proven track record of developing data-driven solutions that increased revenue by 40% and reduced operational costs by 25%. Expert in Python, SQL, and cloud-based analytics platforms.

experiences.title: Senior Data Analyst
bullets: Led data analytics team of 5 analysts, implementing automated reporting systems that reduced manual reporting time by 60%
Developed predictive models that increased customer retention by 35% and generated ₦50M in additional revenue
Built interactive dashboards using Tableau and Power BI, providing real-time insights to C-suite executives
Collaborated with product team to analyze user behavior data, leading to 3 major product improvements

experiences.title: Data Analyst
bullets: Analyzed customer transaction data for Nigeria's top e-commerce platform, identifying ₦30M in revenue opportunities
Created automated ETL pipelines using Python, reducing data processing time from 8 hours to 45 minutes
Presented monthly insights to stakeholders, influencing strategic decisions across marketing and operations
Trained 15+ team members on SQL and data visualization best practices

experiences.title: Junior Data Analyst
bullets: Performed ad-hoc analysis on customer demographics and behavior patterns for 20+ startup clients
Built Excel-based financial models that helped 5 startups secure Series A funding
Collaborated with marketing teams to optimize campaign performance, improving ROI by 45%

projects.name: Customer Churn Prediction System
projects.details: Built ML model using Python and scikit-learn to predict customer churn with 87% accuracy, deployed on AWS

projects.name: Sales Forecasting Dashboard
projects.details: Developed real-time sales forecasting tool using Tableau and Python, adopted by 200+ sales representatives

projects.name: Open Source Contributor
projects.details: Active contributor to pandas and data visualization libraries on GitHub

certifications: Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Scientist Associate (2021)
